toast.title: Toast Notifications
toast.desc: Control whether to show toasts on state updates or command events.

state_change.title: State Change Toast
state_change.desc: Show toast on every state topic update.

command.title: Command Sent Toast
command.desc: Show toast when sending command packets.

activity_log.title: Activity Log
activity_log.desc: Control which log types appear in dashboards and detail views.

hide_automation_scripts.title: Hide automation/script logs
hide_automation_scripts.desc: Hide automation and script execution entries from activity log lists.

log_sharing.title: Log & Data Sharing
log_sharing.desc: Send anonymized logs and packets (1000) to the developer for troubleshooting.

consent_modal.title: Log & Data Sharing Consent
consent_modal.desc: To improve service quality and troubleshoot issues, anonymized data will be collected and sent to the developer.
consent_modal.collection_item_1: System runtime environment (architecture, HA Supervisor status)
consent_modal.collection_timing_desc: Packet collection starts every time the add-on starts after consent. Once 1000 packets are collected, they are sent once and collection automatically stops. No further collection occurs until the add-on is restarted.
consent_modal.privacy_note: * No personal information is included. You can change this setting anytime.

log_retention.title: Log Retention
log_retention.desc: Store logs (packet, activity) on the server for the configured TTL. Default is 1 hour.
log_retention.enable_desc: Uses server memory when enabled. When disabled, only logs during the current UI session are available.
log_retention.manual_save_desc: Save the current logs in memory to a file immediately.
log_retention.ttl_desc: Keep logs in memory for the TTL, and automatically remove expired entries.
log_retention.auto_save_desc: When enabled, a single file is saved every TTL ({ttl} hours).
log_retention.retention_count_desc: Older files will be automatically deleted.
log_retention.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this log file?
log_retention.delete_except_recent_confirm: Delete all log files except the most recent {count}?

packet_log.title: Saved Packet Logs
packet_log.desc: Log files created by raw packet recording.
packet_log.delete_all_confirm: Delete all saved packet log files?
packet_log.delete_except_recent_confirm: Delete all packet log files except the most recent {count}?
packet_log.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this packet log file?

backup_management.title: Backup Management
backup_management.desc: Manage configuration backup files created during edits.
backup_management.delete_except_recent_confirm: Delete all backup files except the most recent {count}?

app_control.title: Application Control
app_control.restart_desc: Restart the Homenet2MQTT service. Connection will be lost momentarily.
app_control.restart_confirm: Are you sure you want to restart the service?
app_control.mqtt_cleanup_desc: Clear all retained MQTT messages published by the application. Use this when you want to remove unnecessary MQTT messages after port name changes or other operations.
app_control.mqtt_cleanup_confirm: Are you sure you want to clear all retained MQTT messages? The service will restart after clearing.

bridge_config.title: Bridge Management
bridge_config.add_desc: Add a new RS485 bridge configuration.
bridge_config.edit_hint: Ctrl+S: Save. Restart required to apply changes.
bridge_config.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete {filename}? (A backup will be created)
bridge_config.delete_last_warning: This is the last bridge. Deleting it will restart the setup wizard.
bridge_config.delete_last_confirm:
Are you sure you want to delete {filename}?

⚠️ This is the last bridge. Deleting it will restart the setup wizard.

automation_logs.title: Automation/Script logs
automation_logs.empty: No automation or script logs to display.

packet_log.title: Packet Log (RX/TX)
packet_log.desc: List of parsed received packets and packets sent by H2M.

raw_log.title: Raw Packet Log
raw_log.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this log?
raw_log.ha_app_download_warning: Downloads may not work in the Home Assistant Companion App. Please try a web browser.
raw_log.desc: List of raw packets received from RS485 devices with intervals.
raw_log.filter_hint: Support wildcards (*, ?). Only the most recent 1000 packets are searched. Intervals are hidden while filtering.
raw_log.valid_only_hint: Shows packets with valid header, checksum, and footer.
raw_log.set_desc: Unique set of valid packets with matched/unmatched status.
raw_log.set_valid_hint: Enable 'Show valid packets only' to build a valid packet set.
raw_log.auto_stopped_limit: Recording automatically stopped because it reached the limit (20 minutes or 10,000 packets).

cel_analyzer.title: CEL Analyzer
cel_analyzer.desc: Quickly test CEL expressions used in config schemas.
cel_analyzer.mode_state_hint: Use to validate CEL for state_* fields.
cel_analyzer.mode_command_hint: Use to test CEL for command_* fields.
cel_analyzer.mode_checksum_hint: Use to experiment with tx_checksum/rx_checksum CEL.
cel_analyzer.data_hint: Hex values with 0x prefix are allowed. (e.g. [0x01, 0x02])
cel_analyzer.json_help: Provide inputs in JSON format (single-quoted objects are accepted).
cel_analyzer.result_hint: If the result is null, double-check the expression and inputs.
cel_analyzer.invalid_number_array: Array values must be numbers (decimal or hex).

packet_analyzer.title: Packet Analysis Test
packet_analyzer.desc: Analyze input packets through the core parser path to inspect valid packets and matches.
packet_analyzer.input_hint: Whitespace/newlines are ignored. 0x prefixes are supported.
packet_analyzer.note: This does not send packets to devices.

packet_dictionary.title: Packet Dictionary
packet_dictionary.desc: View all packets collected by the bridge. 'Matched' packets are matched to entities, 'Unmatched' packets are valid but not matched to any entity.

header.beta_badge_label: This is a beta version. Features may be unstable.

gallery.title: Config Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Browse and apply community-shared configuration snippets.
gallery.author: Author
gallery.incompatible_version: Incompatible version. Please update Homenet2MQTT to v{minVersion} or later. (Current: v{appVersion})

preview.title: Snippet Preview
preview.conflict_desc: An existing item with ID '{id}' was found.
preview.success_with_backup: Snippet applied successfully. Backup file has been created. Please restart the addon to apply changes.
preview.confirm_warning: This snippet may not work if the protocol (vendor) does not match your current settings.
preview.conflicts_found: {count} conflict(s) found. Choose how to handle each item.

compatibility.title: Compatibility Check
compatibility.force_apply: Apply even if settings don't match
compatibility.force_apply_warning: Applying with incompatible settings may cause the snippet to not work properly.

parameters.title: Template Parameters
parameters.validation_object_array: Please enter a JSON array of objects.

dashboard.hint_inactive_performance: Deleting inactive entities can improve performance
dashboard.error_hint_restart: A connection issue occurred. Please check your settings or refresh the page.

errors.title: Entity Errors
errors.empty: No errors recorded for this entity.

automation.execute_desc: Immediately runs the then block for this automation.
automation.toggle_desc: Disabled automations will not run on triggers.
automation.delete_desc: Remove this automation from the configuration.

entity.logs_empty: No entity activity logs to display.

script.execute_desc: Executes the script action sequence immediately.
script.delete_desc: Remove this script from the configuration.

config.restart_confirm: Do you want to restart the bridge to apply changes?
config.restart_initiated: Restart initiated. The page will reload shortly.

rename.title: Rename
rename.desc: This will also rename the Home Assistant entity.

revoke.title: Revoke Discovery
revoke.desc:
Removes the entity's discovery information from Home Assistant.
It will be automatically re-registered when a state packet is received.
revoke.confirm:
Are you sure you want to revoke this entity's discovery information?
(It will be re-registered when a state packet is received)

force_active.title: Force Active
force_active.desc: Always publish discovery regardless of state reception. May appear as unavailable in HA in some cases.

delete.title: Delete Entity
delete.desc:
Permanently removes this entity from the configuration file.
This action cannot be undone.
delete.confirm:
Are you sure you want to delete this entity?
This action cannot be undone and it will be permanently removed from the configuration file.
delete.success: Deleted. You may need to restart the service to apply changes.

errors.BRIDGE_NOT_CONFIGURED: Bridge is not configured or failed to start.
errors.BRIDGE_STARTING: Bridge is starting... (If it persists, check if the port is being used by another device)
errors.SERIAL_PATH_NOT_FOUND: Serial port path was not found.
errors.SERIAL_PORT_BUSY: Serial port is in use by another process.
errors.SERIAL_CONNECT_FAILED: Failed to connect to the serial port.
errors.EXAMPLE_READ_FAILED: Failed to read example configuration file.
errors.SERIAL_CONFIG_MISSING: Serial configuration is missing from the config file.
errors.SERIAL_TEST_FAILED: Failed to test the serial path.
errors.SERIAL_PATH_DUPLICATE: The serial path is already in use. Please choose another path.
errors.PORT_ID_DUPLICATE: The port ID is already in use. Please enter a different ID.
errors.CORE_NO_VALID_CONFIG: All configuration files failed to load.
errors.MQTT_CONNECT_FAILED: Failed to connect to the MQTT broker.

setup_wizard.title: Initial Setup
setup_wizard.subtitle: Configure basic settings to start the RS485 HomeNet Bridge.
setup_wizard.example_hint: Choose an example that matches your HomeNet system.
setup_wizard.serial_path_hint: Enter the RS485 device path or TCP address.
setup_wizard.serial_port_id_hint: Enter the port identifier used in MQTT topics.
setup_wizard.serial_manual_hint: Empty configs store only the serial settings. Add devices/entities in YAML later.
setup_wizard.serial_test_empty: No raw packets received yet. Check the wiring or try again.
setup_wizard.serial_test_error: Failed to read from the serial path. Please try again.
setup_wizard.serial_test_failed_warning: Serial connection failed. You can modify the serial path in the homenet2mqtt/default.homenet_bridge.yaml file manually.
setup_wizard.validation_error: Please select an option and fill out the serial settings.
setup_wizard.restarting: Please restart the addon or container.
setup_wizard.manual_config_update_required: {filename} has been created. Please add it to the config_files array.
setup_wizard.pdf_desc: Configure packet timeouts and options. Keep default values if unsure.
setup_wizard.pdf_rx_timeout_hint: Time to determine packet completion. e.g. 10ms
setup_wizard.pdf_tx_delay_hint: Delay before sending a packet. e.g. 50ms
setup_wizard.pdf_tx_timeout_hint: Max time to wait for an ACK. e.g. 500ms
setup_wizard.pdf_tx_retry_cnt_hint: Number of retries if no response.
setup_wizard.pdf_header_footer_desc: Enter as JSON array ([0xAA, 0x55]) or string.
setup_wizard.pdf_checksum_exclusive_hint: Checksum and Checksum2 cannot both be set. Clear the other field to switch.
setup_wizard.pdf_checksum2_hint: Use 2-byte checksum types (e.g. xor_add) or CEL expressions.
setup_wizard.pdf_rx_valid_headers_hint: Allowed RX header bytes, e.g. [0xB0, 0xAB]. Leave empty for no filtering.
setup_wizard.pdf_rx_length_hint: Fixed packet length. Leave empty if dynamic.
setup_wizard.pdf_rx_length_expr_hint: CEL expression for packet length. Return 0 to fallback to checksum sweep.
setup_wizard.entities_desc: Select devices and sensors to use. Unchecked items will be excluded from the configuration.
setup_wizard.no_entities_found: No selectable entities found in this example configuration.
